name: Ar.de #0001
description: The survival of the human race, is based on intricate conditions of dependence on the natural environment, which has absurdly consumed the available resources in an excessive way. Timelapse with the graphs of carbon monoxide emission in every day of 2020, in which more than 222 thousand outbreaks of burning were recorded, superimposed on photographs of areas devastated by forest fires in Brazil. by Morbeck // twitter: @teumorbeck // https://linktr.ee/mateusmorbeck
